translation.en: [narrator] This is a world like no other,
one brimming with mystery and teeming with danger,
filled with hundreds of islands strewn across vast seas.
translation.de: Mit Hunderten von Inseln, die über gewaltige Meere verstreut sind.

translation.en: And throughout these seas are those who live according to their own rules,
translation.de: Und auf diesen Meeren tummeln sich jene, die nach ihren eigenen Regeln leben.

translation.en: who seek a life of freedom and adventure.
translation.de: Jene, die Freiheit und Abenteuer suchen.

translation.en: This is a world of pirates!
translation.de: Dies ist eine Welt voller Piraten.

translation.en: [man] Piracy is a scourge upon this world.
translation.de: Piraterie ist eine Geißel dieser Welt.

translation.en: For too long, villains and miscreants have sown havoc across our seas.
translation.de: Zu lange schon verursachen Schurken Chaos in unseren Meeren.

translation.en: But the Marines, on behalf of your World Government,
translation.de: Doch die Marine hat im Namen der Weltregierung

translation.en: strive to keep you safe and protected.
translation.de: das Ziel, euch alle zu beschützen.

translation.en: And today we've made a great stride in that effort.
translation.de: Und heute haben wir einen Meilenstein erreicht.

translation.en: Gold Roger,
the so-called King of the Pirates, has been captured.
translation.de: der sogenannte König der Piraten, wurde gefangen genommen.

translation.en: His reign of terror ends this day.
Peace shall be restored.
Let this be a message to break the spirit of anyone foolish enough
translation.de: Dies soll eine Warnung für alle sein, die dumm genug sind, in seine Fußstapfen zu treten.

translation.en: to follow in his footsteps.
translation.de: die dumm genug sind, in seine Fußstapfen zu treten.

translation.en: Gold Roger,
you have been sentenced to death
for the crimes of piracy,
thievery,
and conspiracy against the World Government.
-Do you have any last words? -Yeah.
Would you take these off? Starting to itch.
translation.de: Könnt ihr die abnehmen? Die jucken.

translation.en: I warned you.
You brought this upon yourself.
translation.de: Das hast du dir selbst zuzuschreiben.

translation.en: That I did, Vice-Admiral.
Now I'm bringing it to one and all.
[man] By the authority of the World Government…
I declare your life
forfeit--
[man 2] Pirate King, where is your treasure?
translation.de: Piratenkönig! -Wo ist dein Schatz? -Wo hast du ihn versteckt?

translation.en: -[man 3] Tell us where you hid it! -[crowd clamoring]
translation.de: -Wo ist dein Schatz? -Wo hast du ihn versteckt?

translation.en: You want to know where my treasure is?
translation.de: Ihr wollt wissen, wo mein Schatz ist?

translation.en: I'll tell you.
Wealth.
Fame.
Power.
I found everything this world has to offer.
Free yourselves.
Take to the seas!
My treasure is yours to find.
[narrator] Gold Roger's final words changed the world forever.
translation.de: Gol D. Rogers letzten Worte veränderten die Welt für immer.

translation.en: A new age was born,
the Great Pirate Era,
setting off a race across the seas to find the Pirate King's hidden treasure,
translation.de: Sie setzte ein Rennen in Gang, eine Suche nach dem verlorenen Schatz.

translation.en: the One Piece.
[man] Ever since I was a kid,
Shanks would tell me stories about pirates and their adventures.
translation.de: erzählte mir Shanks von Piraten und ihren Abenteuern.

translation.en: So, yeah, the sea's been calling.
Well, not exactly calling, because I pretty much can't swim,
translation.de: "Rufen" trifft es nicht ganz. Ich kann nämlich nicht schwimmen.

translation.en: but you get the idea.
I'm setting out to follow my dream,
to find the One Piece
and become King of the Pirates!
translation.de: und König der Piraten zu werden!

translation.en: All I need is a loyal crew.
I think about ten men should do.
Well, ten men and a bird.
translation.de: Also zehn Männer und einen Vogel.

translation.en: It's not gonna be easy. The ocean is… is pretty big
translation.de: Das wird nicht leicht. Das Meer ist ziemlich groß.

translation.en: and kind of dangerous.
So what do you say?
Are you with me?
Mutiny.
Oh man.
It's my first day.
Fire!
Fire!
[woman] Take everything!
But leave the crew to me.
Let's show 'em what true terror looks like.
translation.de: Ich zeige ihnen, was Terror bedeutet. Zu Befehl!

translation.en: Where is the pirate hunter Roronoa Zoro?
translation.de: Wo ist der Piratenjäger Lorenor Zorro?

translation.en: Don't deny he was on your ship.
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass er auf eurem Schiff war.

translation.en: He booked passage to Sixis Island. After that, I don't know.
translation.de: Er fuhr rüber nach Sixis. Mehr weiß ich nicht.

translation.en: Liar! I know Zoro must be after me. Who else is worthy of his pursuit?
translation.de: Lügner. Zorro ist hinter mir her. Wer sonst ist seiner würdig?

translation.en: He had a list of pirates and their bounties.
translation.de: Er hatte eine Liste mit Kopfgeldern.

translation.en: And of course, I was at the top.
Actually, your name wasn't on it.
No! No!
-Koby, clean up this mess. -Coming, Captain Alvida!
[Alvida] Who's the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.de: Wer ist die mächtigste Piratin der Meere?

translation.en: -[pirates yelling] Alvida! -Captain Alvida! Yeah!
Who's there?
Knock it off!
Please don't kill me.
-Hey. -Please.
Hey, hey, hey. I'm not gonna kill you, all right?
translation.de: Hey. Ich werde dich nicht töten, ok?

translation.en: I just need you to be quiet.
First things first.
-Do you have any food here? -[Koby] What?
I'm starving.
Alvida doesn't let me eat until after she finishes her meal.
translation.de: Ich darf erst nach Alvida essen.

translation.en: -Who's Alvida? -This is her ship.
-She's captain of the Alvida Pirates. -Oh, that's great!
-It is? -[man] Yeah!
'Cause I'm a pirate too.
[Koby] You don't look like a pirate.
-What do they look like? -Pirates are scum.
They're thieves and murderers.
Not the pirates I know.
Shanks. He's back!
Work fast as the breeze, men!
Captain wants this haul to the traders by nightfall.
translation.de: Die Beute soll heute noch zum Händler.

translation.en: Before those Marine bastards get back on our trail.
Easy with this, Roux. It's worth more than the rest of the loot put together.
translation.de: Vorsichtig, Lou. Die ist mehr wert als der ganze Rest.

translation.en: [Roux] Aye, captain.
Pretend it's a leg of lamb. You wouldn't drop that.
translation.de: Tu so, als sei's eine deiner Lammkeulen.

translation.en: -Here. -[pirate] Got it, Captain.
Luffy! I was wondering when you'd pop up.
translation.de: Ruffy! Da bist du ja endlich.

translation.en: Our favorite street urchin comes to welcome us back. [grunts]
How ya been, kid?
I'm not an urchin. I'm a pirate!
translation.de: Ich bin kein Straßenkind. Ich bin ein Pirat!

translation.en: I'm not joking. I'm ready to join your crew.
translation.de: Im Ernst. Ich bin bereit für deine Crew.

translation.en: The sea isn't a child's game.
It's dangerous. The scars on my face are proof of that.
translation.de: Es ist gefährlich. Davon zeugen meine Narben.

translation.en: I can do it, Shanks. I swear.
translation.de: Ich kriege das hin, Shanks. Ich schwöre.

translation.en: You're not ready. I am. And I'll show you!
translation.de: -Du bist nicht bereit. -Doch. Und ich beweise es dir.

translation.en: Might want to take it easy on him, Captain.
translation.de: Nimm ihn nicht zu hart ran.

translation.en: He's got no family to speak of. The kid's on his own.
translation.de: Er hat keine Familie. Er ist allein.

translation.en: Better a disappointed kid now than a dead one later.
translation.de: Lieber jetzt enttäuscht als später tot.

translation.en: Let's get this done. [grunts]
-These men need a drink. -[man] Aye, Captain.
-And a bath. -Hey, Shanks!
[Shanks] Put it down, Luffy. Before you hurt yourself.
translation.de: Leg das weg, bevor du dich verletzt.

translation.en: I'm not afraid of getting hurt. And I'll prove it to you.
translation.de: Davor habe ich keine Angst. Ich beweise es dir.

translation.en: Luffy!
[Koby] I don't get it. Why would anyone want to be a pirate?
translation.de: Ich versteh's nicht. Warum will man ein Pirat werden?

translation.en: 'Cause it's the best thing there is.
You have the… the wind in your back,
translation.de: Man hat den Wind im Rücken,

translation.en: the salty sea air,
your loyal crew by your side.
You never know what's on the horizon.
It's all about being… free.
translation.de: Es geht darum, frei zu sein.

translation.en: Nothing's free about Alvida's crew.
She tells me when to eat, when to sleep.
translation.de: Sie sagt mir, wann ich esse und schlafe.

translation.en: I even have to paint her toenails.
translation.de: Ich muss sogar ihre Nägel lackieren.

translation.en: -So why don't you just leave? -No one leaves Alvida!
translation.de: Dann geh doch. Niemand verlässt Alvida.

translation.en: She'll never let me go.
You should never let anyone tell you what you can't do.
translation.de: Lass dir nie sagen, was du nicht kannst.

translation.en: If I did that, I never would've left my village to go find the One Piece.
translation.de: Täte ich das, wäre ich nie losgezogen, um das One Piece zu finden.

translation.en: Gold Roger's treasure?
That's impossible. Every pirate in the world is after that.
translation.de: Das ist unmöglich. Jeder Pirat auf der Welt sucht danach.

translation.en: Why shouldn't I be the one to find it?
As soon as I'm out of here, I'm on my way to the Grand Line.
translation.de: Hiernach segle ich direkt zur Grandline.

translation.en: Pirate graveyard.
There are a-hundred-foot waves and sea beasts that'll crush your bones.
translation.de: Dreißig Meter hohe Wellen und entsetzliche Meeresbestien.

translation.en: Once you enter the Grand Line, you never return.
translation.de: Bist du einmal dort, gibt es kein Zurück.

translation.en: It sounds kind of fun.
Wait!
Is… is that… is that one of the sea beasts?
[Koby] It's just Alvida snoring. If you want to get out of here, it's now or never.
translation.de: Das ist Alvidas Schnarchen. Das ist deine Chance, zu verschwinden.

translation.en: Lifeboats are tied at the stern of the ship.
-Gonna need one of these. -[Koby] Head due north.
-You should hit land in a few days. -North. Which way is north?
translation.de: -In ein paar Tagen findest du Land. -Nordwärts. Wo ist der Norden?

translation.en: [Alvida] What the hell is going on up there?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel ist da oben los?

translation.en: -What's the meaning of this? -Alvida, I can explain.
You dare betray me to a bounty hunter?
translation.de: Du verrätst mich an einen Kopfgeldjäger?

translation.en: No, that's not it at all.
And you, you're too scrawny to be Roronoa Zoro.
translation.de: Du bist zu dürr, um Lorenor Zorro zu sein.

translation.en: I'm Monkey D. Luffy.
Never heard of you.
Well, remember the name, 'cause I'm gonna be King of the Pirates.
translation.de: Präg dir den Namen ein, denn ich werde König der Piraten.

translation.en: You must be new around here, boy,
because who is the most powerful pirate on the seas?
translation.de: Denn wer ist die mächtigste Piratin der Meere?

translation.en: -[pirates] Captain Alvida! -Captain Alvida!
I'm sorry. I didn't hear you, Koby.
Who's the most powerful pirate on the seas?
-Answer me, you sniveling runt. -He doesn't have to.
translation.de: Antworte mir, du Wicht. Das muss er nicht.

translation.en: Koby's his own man.
-Shut up. -[Alvida] No. No, he's not.
He's mine, and he'll always be mine.
That's not what he told me.
translation.de: Mir hat er was anderes gesagt.

translation.en: He said that you were mean.
-[chuckles] -[Luffy] And cruel.
And that you're as dumb as a sea cow.
translation.de: Und so dumm wie eine Seekuh.

translation.en: No, Captain Alvida! I didn't!
What kind of a monster are you?
translation.de: Was bist du für ein Monster?

translation.en: The stretchy kind.
You! This is all your fault!
translation.de: Du! Das ist alles deine Schuld!

translation.en: That's enough.
Gum Gum…
Pistol!
Anyone else got a problem with Koby? [pirates] No, sir.
translation.de: -Hat noch jemand ein Problem mit Corby? -Nein.

translation.en: Come on.
We're gonna need a boat and enough food for a few days.
translation.de: Wir brauchen ein Boot und Essen.

translation.en: -Me? -Yeah!
You're coming with me, right?
[man] You can come out.
[man 2] People often visit shrines to light candles for those they've lost.
translation.de: Menschen besuchen Schreine, um Kerzen für die Verstorbenen anzuzünden.

translation.en: Who are yours for?
This one is for someone I knew a long time ago.
translation.de: Die ist für jemanden, den ich einst kannte.

translation.en: [man 2] And the other?
[man] You've been following me for three days.
translation.de: Du folgst mir seit drei Tagen.

translation.en: -What do you want? -[man 2] You may call me Mr. 7.
I represent an organization known as Baroque Works.
translation.de: Ich vertrete eine Organisation, die Baroque-Firma.

translation.en: We are interested in your unique set of skills,
translation.de: Wir sind interessiert an deinen Fähigkeiten,

translation.en: pirate hunter Roronoa Zoro.
What are you? Some band of assassins?
translation.de: Was seid ihr? Eine Bande von Attentätern?

translation.en: We are much, much more.
translation.de: Wir sind sehr viel mehr als das.

translation.en: You should know it's a high honor to be asked to join our ranks.
translation.de: Es ist eine große Ehre, bei uns aufgenommen zu werden.

translation.en: Kind of got my own thing going on.
translation.de: Ich habe da mein eigenes Ding.

translation.en: Membership would make you even more invincible, more feared.
translation.de: Du würdest noch unbesiegbarer werden. Noch gefürchteter.

translation.en: Does it come with a free face tattoo?
My favorite is Number 1.
To turn down Baroque Works is to forfeit your life.
translation.de: Wer die Baroque-Firma ablehnt, verwirkt sein Leben.

translation.en: [Zoro] If they were that serious, they should've sent someone better than Number 7.
translation.de: Wenn sie es ernst meinten, hätten sie nicht Nummer 7 schicken sollen.

translation.en: [Koby] That look on Alvida's face.
I've never seen anyone stand up to her before.
translation.de: Ihr hat sich noch nie jemand widersetzt.

translation.en: -[Luffy] Shouldn't have messed with you. -How did you stretch like that?
translation.de: -Sie war selbst schuld. -Wieso bist du so dehnbar?

translation.en: It's kind of a long story.
[Shanks] At least you didn't get your eye. I was aiming for it, but I missed.
translation.de: -Immerhin ist dein Auge noch drin. -Ich habe es verfehlt.

translation.en: -I thought you said you were tough. -I am!
Don't stitch it too good. I want everyone to see my scar.
translation.de: Vernäh es nicht zu gut. Man soll meine Narbe sehen können.

translation.en: Scars don't make the man, Luffy.
translation.de: Narben machen dich nicht zum Mann.

translation.en: It's the lesson behind the scar, and you didn't earn this one.
translation.de: Sondern die Lektionen. Deine Narbe ist nicht verdient.

translation.en: Then let me earn it. I'll be the best pirate ever.
translation.de: Dann verdiene ich sie mir. Ich werde der allerbeste Pirat.

translation.en: Look, I've been practicing what my face is gonna look like on my wanted poster.
translation.de: Ich habe geübt, wie ich auf meinem Steckbrief gucke.

translation.en: I've no doubt your mug will be on a wanted poster one day.
translation.de: Irgendwann kommst du sicher auf einen Steckbrief.

translation.en: But you're not ready. My ship already has an anchor.
translation.de: Aber du bist nicht bereit. Ich habe schon einen Anker.

translation.en: I'm not an anchor.
Stupid Shanks.
[grunts] Stupid treasure.
[man] There you go, Captain.
Bring us your best whiskey.
I'm afraid we're out.
That'd be our fault, friend. We've, uh, been doing some celebrating.
translation.de: Daran sind wir schuld. Wir haben gefeiert.

translation.en: We've drunk the place dry, but…
perhaps this will make up for it.
What can we do with one bottle?
translation.de: Was sollen wir mit einer Flasche?

translation.en: Generally, you drink it.
Now there's glass everywhere.
Makino, got a mop?
Since you like cleaning so much.
Come on, men. Let's find a real bar.
translation.de: Kommt, Männer. Suchen wir uns eine richtige Bar.

translation.en: -He got you good, huh, Cap'n? -[man 2] "You got a mop?"
Why are you laughing?
How could you let him insult you like that?
translation.de: Wieso hast du dich demütigen lassen?

translation.en: All he did was spill a drink on me.
But you should've fought back! Why didn't you kick his ass?
translation.de: Du hättest dich wehren sollen. Warum hast du ihn nicht verprügelt?

translation.en: Not everything can be solved with violence.
A man needs to be strong, but he also needs to be good.
translation.de: Ein Mann muss stark sein, aber auch anständig.

translation.en: You're not a real man.
You're nothing but a coward.
You see?
I told you, you weren't ready. -[groans] -[Shanks] Wait.
translation.de: Du bist noch nicht bereit. Warte, Ruffy…

translation.en: -Luffy! -[grunting]
What have you done?
[Koby] You ate a Devil Fruit?
I didn't know any better.
But mine was a Gum Gum Fruit. It turned my body into rubber.
translation.de: Es war eine Gum-Gum-Frucht. Mein Körper wurde zu Gummi.

translation.en: So now what?
-We have to be going somewhere, right? -[Luffy] We are going somewhere.
Next stop,
to the Grand Line!
Do you know how to get there?
You can't navigate. You don't even have a map!
translation.de: Du hast ja nicht mal eine Karte!

translation.en: Good point.
We should probably pick one up.
Maybe I've made a mistake. I never should've left Alvida.
translation.de: Das war ein Fehler. Ich hätte bei Alvida bleiben sollen.

translation.en: Koby, if you could do anything in the world right now,
translation.de: Wenn du alles tun könntest, egal was,

translation.en: what would it be?
I guess there is one thing, but…
it's dumb.
-What was that for? -You being dumb.
Now spit it out.
I've kind of…
I've always wanted to be…
a Marine.
Ever since I was a kid,
I wanted to protect people that can't protect themselves.
translation.de: Ich will die beschützen, die es nicht selbst können.

translation.en: I told you it was dumb.
If that's what you want,
I think you should do it.
I'll help you out.
You don't even know me. We shared a meal, Koby.
translation.de: -Du kennst mich nicht. -Wir haben gemeinsam gegessen.

translation.en: And if being a Marine is your dream…
translation.de: Und wenn du zur Marine willst…

translation.en: that's good enough for me.
Okay.
So you plot a course to the next Marine base.
translation.de: Du planst den Kurs zur nächsten Marinebasis.

translation.en: I get my map,
and you can join up. Yeah.
All right. Well, I'm gonna take that nap now.
translation.de: Ok. Ich mache erst mal ein Nickerchen.

translation.en: You can't just waltz into a Marine base and ask for a map to the Grand Line!
translation.de: Du kannst dort nicht einfach nach einer Karte zur Grandline fragen.

translation.en: Don't worry.
I'm stealthy.
Yeah. Super stealthy.
[man] There's someone in there. Let's get closer.
translation.de: Da ist wer an Bord. Bring uns näher ran.

translation.en: Help me!
Water…
Oh, you're in luck, sweetheart. We're all the help you'll need.
translation.de: Du hast Glück, Süße. Wir helfen dir.

translation.en: My crew was attacked by pirates.
translation.de: Meine Crew wurde von Piraten angegriffen.

translation.en: I… I barely managed to make it out alive.
[man] Pirates, you say?
I hear they're a terrible lot.
[man 2] The worst sort. Good thing we found you instead of them.
translation.de: Und wie. Zum Glück haben wir dich gefunden.

translation.en: What you got there? Something to share?
translation.de: Was hast du da? Etwas zum Teilen?

translation.en: No. Please, no, it's… it's all I have. Please.
translation.de: Nein… Bitte nicht. Das ist alles, was ich habe. Bitte…

translation.en: It's a fair trade for saving your life. [grunts]
translation.de: Ein fairer Tausch für deine Rettung.

translation.en: Hey, what gives?
Sorry, boys. Thanks for the rescue.
[Luffy] I didn't know there were so many pirates!
There are way worse pirates on the Grand Line. It's terrible.
translation.de: Die auf der Grandline sind noch schlimmer. Schrecklich.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah. I know, right?
Where's my face?
Well, only one way I'm gonna get inside that base.
translation.de: Na ja… Es gibt nur einen Weg in diese Basis.

translation.en: And it's not on an empty stomach.
translation.de: Und zwar mit einem vollen Magen.

translation.en: Come on.
We already have our food.
No, more is better. More is better. You gotta feed the brain.
translation.de: Mehr ist besser. Du musst das Gehirn füttern.

translation.en: All right, so…
I can't get inside the base through the gate,
translation.de: Durch das Tor komme ich nicht rein.

translation.en: but maybe… maybe… maybe what if I get inside flying?
translation.de: Aber was wäre, wenn ich hineinfliege?

translation.en: I can grab onto a bird or something.
translation.de: Ich halte mich an einem Vogel fest.

translation.en: That's a terrible idea.
Keep your voice down.
A bottle for me, and one for my friend. He's had a rough day.
translation.de: Eine Flasche für mich und meinen Freund. Sein Tag war hart.

translation.en: Hi. Can I buy you a drink?
translation.de: Hi. Darf ich dir einen ausgeben?

translation.en: Too tall.
You like rum?
Yeah, sure.
As much as the next guy.
I'm not asking the next guy.
-What's this? -Rice balls. For you.
-You made them yourself? -Mm-hmm.
-What's the brown stuff? -Chocolate. Makes everything taste better.
translation.de: Und das Braune? -Schokolade. Damit schmeckt alles besser. -Rika?

translation.en: [woman] Rika?
You stupid, stupid girl.
-Why don't you watch where you're going? -[woman] Rika, apologize to our guest.
translation.de: -Pass auf, wo du hingehst. -Rika, entschuldige dich bitte.

translation.en: I'm… I'm so sorry.
[mockingly] "I'm so sorry!"
Next time, I won't be so nice.
translation.de: Nächstes Mal bin ich nicht so nett.

translation.en: [Zoro] You dropped my food.
Delicious.
Now you eat one.
And apologize to the girl.
Do you know who I am?
A shithead Marine with a bad haircut.
I wouldn't do that.
Oh, come on, tough guy. Three swords? [laughs]
I only need one.
Okay.
-But it's gonna hurt. -[grunts]
[Luffy] Wow.
Good fighter.
You shouldn't draw your blade unless you're prepared to use it.
translation.de: Zieh deine Klinge nur, wenn du sie auch nutzen willst.

translation.en: Don't kill me, please. My father will give you anything you want.
translation.de: Töte mich nicht. Mein Vater gibt dir alles, was du willst.

translation.en: Who's your father?
Captain Morgan.
He's in charge of the Marine base.
Then he owes me money.
I understand you sent four of my Marines to the infirmary.
translation.de: Du hast vier Soldaten auf die Krankenstation geschickt.

translation.en: Without drawing a blade, I might add.
translation.de: Ohne auch nur eine Klinge zu ziehen.

translation.en: Impressive.
I didn't want to make a mess.
[Morgan] Roronoa Zoro.
The Demon.
Most feared pirate hunter in the East Blue.
Hmm. I'd say you live up to your reputation.
If it's all the same, I'll just take my money and go.
translation.de: Ich hätte gern einfach nur das Geld.

translation.en: [Morgan] You'll collect your bounty,
but the penalty for assaulting a Marine is seven days strung up in the yard.
translation.de: Aber für einen Angriff auf einen Soldaten hängt man sieben Tage lang im Hof.

translation.en: No food or water.
You can try to arrest me, but your brat'll be the first one I kill.
translation.de: Verhafte mich, aber dein Gör töte ich zuerst.

translation.en: Hey! He can't speak to me that way!
translation.de: Hey! So darf er nicht mit mir reden!

translation.en: I like you.
Oh, we should be working for the same team.
translation.de: Wir sollten für dasselbe Team arbeiten.

translation.en: You'd make a hell of a Marine.
Kind of got my own thing going on.
translation.de: Ich habe da mein eigenes Ding.

translation.en: Doesn't leave much time for playing dress-up.
It's a shame to lose a man of your talents,
translation.de: Schade, jemand so Talentiertes zu verlieren.

translation.en: since you won't be able to collect a bounty at any Marine base
translation.de: Du wirst in keiner Basis Kopfgeld kassieren,

translation.en: once I get the word out.
So what's it gonna be?
A new career? [chuckles]
Or the yard?
Seven days?
I could catch up on my sleep.
[Koby] I can't stop thinking about that fight.
translation.de: Ich denke ständig an den Kampf.

translation.en: That guy was amazing.
And what's with the third sword?
I mean, where does it even go?
translation.de: Ich meine, wie hält er das überhaupt?

translation.en: No.
He had to protect that little girl from the Marines,
translation.de: Er musste das Mädchen vor dem Soldaten beschützen,

translation.en: who were supposed to be protecting her.
It doesn't make any sense.
If there are good pirates and bad pirates, then
translation.de: Wenn es gute und schlechte Piraten gibt,

translation.en: there are gonna be good Marines and bad Marines too.
translation.de: gibt es auch gute und schlechte Soldaten.

translation.en: You'll be one of the good ones.
[Koby] Maybe Alvida was right.
I don't know anything about the world.
translation.de: Ich weiß nichts über die Welt.

translation.en: But you were her prisoner.
Yeah, but I knew who I was.
translation.de: Da wusste ich, wer ich war.

translation.en: Now I have no idea.
Hey, Koby.
Koby!
I need to get into the base and find that map,
translation.de: Ich muss in die Basis und die Karte finden.

translation.en: and I could use some help.
You want me to help you steal from the Marines?
translation.de: Ich soll dir beim Stehlen helfen?

translation.en: No. Of course not.
How about you help me
get the boat ready?
You can handle that, right?
I guess so.
What are you gonna do?
I'm working on that.
Beautiful morning, isn't it?
A bit hot for my taste though.
translation.de: Etwas zu heiß für meinen Geschmack.

translation.en: The great Demon.
More like a misbehaving puppy tied up in the backyard.
translation.de: Eher ein frecher Welpe, der im Hof angeleint ist.

translation.en: What do you say, puppy? Do you want to do a trick for me?
translation.de: Was sagst du, Welpe? Hast du ein paar Tricks drauf?

translation.en: Sit up and beg.
Put it down!
What's so special about this old thing? Hmm?
translation.de: Was ist an dem Teil so besonders?

translation.en: Enjoy these seven days,
'cause when I get down from here,
you'll be the one begging.
When you get down?
You think my father's gonna let you go? [scoffs]
translation.de: Glaubst du, mein Vater lässt dich gehen?

translation.en: You are going to die in this yard.
translation.de: Du wirst in diesem Hof sterben.

translation.en: Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut. Hut!
[Marine] About face!
Oh, hey. You're the guy from the bar.
translation.de: Oh, hey. Du bist der Typ aus der Bar.

translation.en: -Get lost. -I am lost.
I'm trying to get inside the base.
Hey, I saw the way you fight. How did they even arrest you?
translation.de: Ich sah deinen Kampf. Wie konnten sie dich verhaften?

translation.en: They didn't.
I gave myself up.
Interesting choice.
I'm sure you had your reasons.
You don't know anything about me.
I know that you protected that little girl from those Marines last night.
translation.de: Du hast dieses Mädchen vor den Soldaten beschützt.

translation.en: You're a good guy.
I'm Roronoa Zoro, the pirate hunter.
translation.de: Ich bin Lorenor Zorro, der Piratenjäger.

translation.en: Well, I'm Monkey D. Luffy,
translation.de: Und ich bin Monkey D. Ruffy.

translation.en: and I will be the King of the Pirates.
And I think you should join my crew.
translation.de: Du solltest dich meiner Crew anschließen.

translation.en: What makes you think I'd wanna play pirates with you?
translation.de: Und warum sollte ich das machen?

translation.en: You're a great fighter.
I'd say that together, we'd make a pretty good team.
translation.de: Wir wären ein ziemlich gutes Team.

translation.en: I kill your kind for a living.
translation.de: Mein Job ist es, Piraten zu töten.

translation.en: Pirate… hunter.
You keep saying that,
but is that all you are?
Is that all you want?
I made a promise to someone a long time ago…
translation.de: Ich gab jemandem vor langer Zeit ein Versprechen.

translation.en: to become the world's greatest swordsman.
Impressive.
You can untie me, but I'm still not gonna join your crew.
translation.de: Bind mich los, aber ich komme nicht mit.

translation.en: Okay.
[Zoro] I mean it. I don't owe you anything.
I just think it's a waste of time for you to be hanging out here
when there's something you want out there.
Good luck on the sword thing.
Hey, can you close this behind me?
translation.de: Hey! Kannst du das hinter mir schließen?

translation.en: Thanks!
[woman] Hey!
You're not supposed to be in here.
Captain Morgan sent me to find a map of The Grand Line ahead of his security briefing this afternoon.
translation.de: Ich soll vor Käpt'n Morgans Briefing die Karte der Grandline holen.

translation.en: Why would he do that? All maps pertaining to The Grand Line
translation.de: Aber warum? Alle Karten der Grandline bewahrt er in seinem Büro auf.

translation.en: are kept under lock and key in his private office.
translation.de: Alle Karten der Grandline bewahrt er in seinem Büro auf.

translation.en: I'm just following orders. But if you want to question Axe-Hand Morgan, be my guest.
translation.de: Ich befolge nur Befehle. Aber du kannst ihn gern anzweifeln.

translation.en: Hey, we don't have any maps to The Grand Line down here, do we?
translation.de: Hey, wir haben hier unten keine Karten zur Grandline, oder?

translation.en: Nah, we didn't get any.
Hey, you're that girl from the bar.
translation.de: Hey. Du bist die aus der Bar.

translation.en: The one who stole my uniform.
This is fine.
No problem.
Whoa! Hey, hey, hey! No, don't do that.
I'm taking you into custody for trespassing on a Marine base.
translation.de: Ich nehme dich fest für das Eindringen in eine Basis.

translation.en: Better take yourself into custody too, 'cause you're not a Marine.
translation.de: Dann nimm dich auch fest. Du bist keine Soldatin.

translation.en: Am too.
[Luffy] No, you're not.
I heard everything.
You stole that guy's uniform. And now you're looking for my map.
translation.de: Du hast die Uniform gestohlen und suchst meine Karte.

translation.en: Your map?
Yep. My map to The Grand Line.
It's my map, and I'm not leaving here without it.
translation.de: Sie gehört mir, ich gehe nicht ohne.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
Hey! Hey! Get back here!
Do you have any idea what you're doing?
translation.de: Hast du eine Ahnung, was du tust?

translation.en: Looking for that Morgan guy's office. Map's there, right?
translation.de: Ich suche das Büro von Morgan. Die Karte soll dort sein, oder?

translation.en: [Marine] Copy that.
That's your plan?
Just walk into Axe-Hand Morgan's office and ask him for the map?
translation.de: Du fragst Morgan mit dem Beilarm einfach nach der Karte?

translation.en: I may have to fight him for it. Why do they call him Axe-Hand anyways?
translation.de: Vielleicht muss ich darum kämpfen. Warum heißt er so?

translation.en: You are going to get us both caught if you keep stomping around this place.
translation.de: Wenn du weiter hier herumtrampelst, werden wir beide erwischt.

translation.en: We need a plan.
Axe-Hand!
Are you going to kill me?
Oh no.
I've got something much worse in mind.
Captain Morgan, sir, I was just escorting this prisoner to the brig.
translation.de: Käpt'n Morgan, ich bringe den Gefangenen in seine Zelle.

translation.en: He was arrested for causing a disturbance in the square.
translation.de: Er hat draußen für Unruhe gesorgt.

translation.en: [Luffy] Yeah.
Prisoner.
I've never seen you before.
translation.de: Ich habe dich noch nie gesehen.

translation.en: I'm a transfer from the 77th, sir.
What's your name, Private?
Nami, sir.
I put in a request to serve under your command.
translation.de: Ich habe einen Antrag gestellt, unter Euch zu dienen.

translation.en: Wise choice.
I expect great things from you.
Yeah. She's the best!
I… I mean, she's the best of the worst.
translation.de: Ich meine, sie ist die Beste der Schlimmsten.

translation.en: I hate the Marines.
Carry on.
That was amazing. Admit it. We do make a pretty good team.
translation.de: Das war super. Wir sind ein tolles Team.

translation.en: We are not a team.
Whatever you say.
Now all we have to do is figure out a way to get into Axe-Man's office.
translation.de: Jetzt müssen wir nur noch einen Weg ins Büro finden.

translation.en: Are those his keys?
How'd you do that?
I'm a thief.
You know, you're really good at thieving… and a good talker too.
translation.de: Du bist eine klasse Diebin. Und echt gut im Reden.

translation.en: You should think about joining my pirate crew.
Let's get one thing straight. I am never joining anything with you.
translation.de: Hör mir mal gut zu. Ich werde mich dir niemals anschließen.

translation.en: I hate pirates. Hate them!
translation.de: Ich hasse Piraten. Ich hasse sie.

translation.en: That's because you don't know me yet.
translation.de: Weil du mich noch nicht kennst.

translation.en: This guy really likes himself.
translation.de: Dieser Typ mag sich selbst echt gern.

translation.en: [Nami] I'm going to find the map. Pretend you're not here.
translation.de: Ich suche die Karte. Tu so, als wärst du nicht hier.

translation.en: But I am here.
[Nami scoffs] Why do you want the map so badly anyway?
translation.de: Warum willst du die Karte überhaupt?

translation.en: I'm gonna use it to find the One Piece and become King of the Pirates.
translation.de: Um das One Piece zu finden und König der Piraten zu werden.

translation.en: -[scoffs] Figures. -What?
Every idiot dreams of finding the One Piece.
translation.de: Jeder Idiot träumt davon, das One Piece zu finden.

translation.en: People like you believe in something and you don't even know what it is.
translation.de: Ihr glaubt an etwas und wisst nicht mal, was es ist.

translation.en: [Luffy] Well, yeah.
Don't you?
So why did you decide to become a thief?
I didn't decide. I needed to eat. You do what you have to, to survive.
translation.de: Es war keine Wahl. Ich musste essen. Ich tat es, um zu überleben.

translation.en: You're right. Nothing more important than food.
translation.de: Du hast recht. Essen ist das Wichtigste.

translation.en: [Nami] Just find the map.
What's going on here?
[Marine] Pirates, sir, inside the base. We're under attack!
translation.de: Piraten, in der Basis. Wir werden angegriffen.

translation.en: What pirates?
A woman with orange hair, dressed like a Marine.
translation.de: Eine Frau mit orangen Haaren, gekleidet wie eine Soldatin.

translation.en: She was trying to steal a map to The Grand Line.
translation.de: Sie sucht die Karte zur Grandline.

translation.en: My keys! Sound the alarm.
Do you think they know we're here?
translation.de: Wissen sie, dass wir hier sind?

translation.en: No, I think they're after the other thief and idiot pirate trying to steal a map.
translation.de: Sie suchen sicher den anderen Dieb und Piraten, die eine Karte stehlen.

translation.en: What are the odds of that?
Kidding. [chuckles]
But you might want to work a little faster.
[Morgan] Open up!
By the authority of the 153rd Marines!
You need to hurry.
-I can't rush this! -Please hurry!
I have an idea.
-That's your idea? -Yeah.
How did you do that?
Aren't you that drunk from the bar?
Glad I made an impression.
The imposter, the pirate hunter, and the prisoner.
translation.de: Die Hochstaplerin, der Piratenjäger und der Gefangene.

translation.en: Fancy that. The three of you working together.
translation.de: Stellt euch das mal vor. Ihr drei arbeitet zusammen.

translation.en: Yeah. We're a crew!
-Nope, not a crew. -Not together.
No enemy has ever escaped my wrath.
translation.de: Kein Feind ist je meinem Zorn entkommen.

translation.en: I alone defeated the Black Cat Pirates.
I alone captured Kuro of the Thousand Plans.
translation.de: Ich allein fing Käpt'n Black, das Superhirn.

translation.en: And I alone keep Shells Town safe from the scum of the East Blue.
translation.de: Und ich allein schütze Shellstown vor dem Abschaum des Eastblue.

translation.en: It's not only the axe. Every part of his body's a weapon.
translation.de: Er hat nicht nur das Beil. Sein ganzer Körper ist eine Waffe.

translation.en: I'll go high. You go low.
So that's where it goes.
Gum Gum Whip!
-Gum Gum Whip? -[Luffy] Yeah!
All the great fighters call out their finishing moves.
No, they don't.
Hate to break up this beautiful moment, but we need to get this safe out of here.
translation.de: Ich störe nur ungern, aber der Tresor muss hier weg.

translation.en: Maybe if we find some rope or something.
Or we can do that.
-Careful with that! -[Zoro] Whatever you say.
Oh, wait. I don't work for you.
translation.de: Warte, ich arbeite nicht für dich.

translation.en: I'm sensing a little bit of tension amongst the crew.
translation.de: Die Crew scheint etwas angespannt zu sein.

translation.en: -Not a crew! -Not a crew!
-I can't leave without my friend. -Can't wait. The Marines will be here.
translation.de: -Mein Freund ist noch nicht hier. -Die Marine aber gleich.

translation.en: The Marines are here already. You're under arrest.
translation.de: Die Marine ist bereits da. Ihr seid verhaftet.

translation.en: What's wrong with his hair? [laughs]
Yeah, I might've done that.
[man] I won't let you make a joke of me.
translation.de: Diesen Spott lasse ich nicht zu.

translation.en: I'm taking you in and handing you over to my father.
translation.de: Ich nehme euch fest und übergebe euch meinem Vater.

translation.en: I'll be the hero. I might even get a medal or something.
translation.de: Dann bin ich der Held und kriege vielleicht einen Orden.

translation.en: -Koby? -[Koby] God, that hurt!
It also felt really good too.
translation.de: Aber es fühlte sich toll an.

translation.en: No time to explain, but we gotta go. This whole island is trying to kill us.
translation.de: Keine Zeit für Erklärungen. Diese Insel will uns töten.

translation.en: I'm not coming with you.
You sure?
Before we met, every choice was made for me.
translation.de: Bevor wir uns trafen, entschied ich nie selbst.

translation.en: But now I'm gonna do what I want to do.
translation.de: Jetzt tue ich, was ich will.

translation.en: I'm gonna be a Marine.
I want to help people that can't help themselves.
translation.de: Ich will denen helfen, die hilflos sind.

translation.en: Next time we meet, we might be enemies.
But for now…
we're friends.
This is Garp.
Pirates, you say?
Raiding our base in Shells Town.
What did they take?
Weapons? Gold?
Change of plan.
We're going to Shells Town.
Got a lead on Baroque Works?
We've been chasing those shadows a long time. This is different.
translation.de: Die jage ich schon lange. Das hier ist anders.

translation.en: A map to the Grand Line has been stolen…
translation.de: Eine Karte zur Grandline wurde gestohlen.

translation.en: by a pirate in a straw hat.
[man] They were pirates, Captain, just like us.
translation.de: Sie waren Piraten, Käpt'n, genau wie wir.

translation.en: And they got the map.
[captain] And you didn't stop them.
translation.de: Und du hast sie nicht aufgehalten.

translation.en: I couldn't. I mean, there were three of them.
translation.de: Ich konnte nicht. Sie waren zu dritt.

translation.en: They must've been planning this for months.
translation.de: Das war sicher seit Monaten geplant.

translation.en: Well, that's my map.
translation.de: Na ja, das ist meine Karte.

translation.en: And I'm gonna get it back.
translation.de: Und ich hole sie mir zurück.

translation.en: No matter who I have to kill.
This is my first pirate score.
From now on, it's all gonna be smooth sailing.
translation.de: IN DIESER STAFFEL ONE PIECE Ab jetzt läuft alles glatt.

translation.en: [Luffy] This crew can handle anything.
We've been making enemies everywhere we go.
Nothing can stop me from taking the East Blue.
We've been captured. We need a plan.
That went pretty well.
[Nami] Arlong will kill the entire village!
translation.de: Arlong wird das ganze Dorf töten!

translation.en: -Nami made her choice. -[Luffy] Ah!
[Luffy] We've got each other's backs… always.
[Garp] So these are the Straw Hat Pirates.
